name: MezzoLogic
description:
MezzoLogic is a full-fledged search engine and digital marketing agency, headquartered in Los Angeles, CA. Their team offers over 300 years of collective experience in Digital Marketing and Search Engine Optimization.
In the organic SEO space, MezzoLogic is currently managing over 500,000 keywords for over 600 active SEO clients, ranging from local small businesses to individual startups, to mid-sized corporations, all the way to some of the worldâ€™s largest brands and Fortune 500 companies.
